p: Currently, on the basis of PolyA:PolyU, the drug Poludan (manufactured by Lance-Farm LLC, Russia) has been developed and registered. It is used in the form of eye and nasal drops in viral eye diseases (adenoviral and herpetic keratoconjunctivitis, keratitis, keratoiridocyclitis, etc.), in complex therapy of influenza and other acute respiratory infections.
